trans-unit.source: Specifies the locations of the tabs in a tab control.
trans-unit.target: 指定选项卡控件中的选项卡位置。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by members such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> enumerations.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>枚举。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following codein a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> called TabControl1.
trans-unit.target: 要运行该示例，请将一个窗体包含以下代码粘贴<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>调用 TabControl1。

trans-unit.source: Call the ChangeTheLookOfTheTabControl method in the form's constructor or Load method.
trans-unit.target: 在窗体的构造函数中的 ChangeTheLookOfTheTabControl 方法或负载方法调用。

trans-unit.source: The tabs are located across the bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: 沿控件的底部放置选项卡。

trans-unit.source: The tabs are located along the left edge of the control.
trans-unit.target: 沿控件的左边缘放置选项卡。

trans-unit.source: The tabs are located along the right edge of the control.
trans-unit.target: 沿控件的右边缘放置选项卡。

trans-unit.source: The tabs are located across the top of the control.
trans-unit.target: 沿控件的顶部放置选项卡。
